title.vi: Kỹ Thuật Phun Mày Kết Hợp
title.ja: コンボブロウテクニック

description.en: Combine microblading and powder for dimensional, natural brows
description.vi: Kết hợp microblading và phun phấn tạo mày tự nhiên có chiều sâu
description.ja: マイクロブレーディングとパウダーを組み合わせて立体的な眉毛を作る
description.es: Combina microblading y polvo para cejas naturales y dimensionales
description.ko: 마이크로블레이딩과 파우더를 결합한 입체적이고 자연스러운 눈썹

subtitle: Best of Both Worlds
introduction: Master the combination technique that blends hair-like strokes with soft shading for the most natural and dimensional brow results. This is the most requested brow style by clients worldwide.

curriculum.name: Technique Integration
curriculum.description: Learn when and how to combine microblading with powder shading

curriculum.name: Stroke Placement
curriculum.description: Strategic hair stroke placement for maximum natural effect

curriculum.name: Shading Methods
curriculum.description: Background shading techniques to add depth and dimension

curriculum.name: Complete Procedures
curriculum.description: Perform full combo brow procedures from start to finish
